thread.title: APPEAL FOR VIDEO: MERCEDES HIT & RUN MY CAR AT NORTHPOINT CARPARK
thread.title_full: APPEAL FOR VIDEO: MERCEDES HIT & RUN MY CAR AT NORTHPOINT CARPARK

author: farhan
title: APPEAL FOR VIDEO: MERCEDES HIT & RUN MY CAR AT NORTHPOINT CARPARK
text:
Advertisement 
Appealing for witnesses... 
My car was parked at Northpoint Shopping Centre on 03 Feb 2017, and was hit by this dark grey mercedes SGB1888E at 2:58pm as seen in the video... It was a hit and run and have thus made a police report... I noticed there are 2 cars parked directly opposite my car, a black mercedes SFX425D and a white bmw SKG6217K, with in car video camera... Appreciate if they could provide me with the footage captured by their cameras, which will be of a great help to me... 
Please help share for awareness! 
‎Andy Ng‎ A.S.S Contibutor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
